question_text: Did any students achieve exemplary (90%+) technical scores in the classical ballet training curriculum (internal evaluation)?
If yes, tell more (name, grade, achievement mark)
If not, why not?
Did any students achieve exemplary (90%+) technical scores in the contemporary dance training curriculum (internal evaluation)?
If yes, tell more (name, grade, achievement mark)
If not, why not?
Did the Artistic Director deliver student master classes to ABS this reporting period?
If yes, how many master classes and how many students received the master class?
Did any graduates receive employment in professional dance companies this reporting period?
If yes, what are their names and which company did they secure employment?
Did we host guest teachers and choreographers to enrich the School's dance repertoire and techniques this reporting period?
If yes, who were the guest teachers or choreographers and what did they teach?
Did Alberta Ballet perform internationally this reporting period?
If yes, which performance and in which country?
If yes, did we promote Alberta Ballet School at the performance?
Did we secure any auditioning students in that country as a result?
Did we participate in international recruitment events this reporting period?
If not, why not?
If yes, did we take advantage of the Artistic Director’s presence in each region to amplify recruitment?
Where and how did we take advantage of the Artistic Director's presence?
How many students did the Artistic Director recommend to the School?
How many students registered for auditions to the School from the Artistic Director's recommendation?
Did we expand scholarship opportunities for international students?
If yes, how many scholarships did we offer and what was the dollar figure?
Did we showcase alumni success stories to highlight our success in launching world-class dancers and inspire prospective students?
If yes, who did we showcase?
Did we increase awareness and reputation of the Alberta Ballet School Affiliates programme (Northern and Southern) throughout Alberta?
If yes, how did we increase awareness?
How many new students registered for Affiliates?
Did Alberta Ballet tour provincially this reporting period?
Did we leverage Alberta Ballet’s provincial tour presence to connect with prospective ABS students through masterclasses and workshops in visited communities?
If yes, which communities did we go to and how many students attended the masterclasses in each city?
Did we offer scholarships to make professional training accessible for marginalised students?
If yes, how many scholarships did we offer and what was the dollar figure?
Did we secure external funding to support these marginalised students?
From what sources and how much money did we secure to support scholarships for marginalised students?
Did we offer scholarships to make professional training accessible for Alberta students?
If yes, how many scholarships did we offer and what was the dollar figure?
Did we secure external funding to make professional training accessible for Alberta students?
From what sources and how much money did we secure to support scholarships for Alberta students?
Did we increase boy enrolment through targeted campaigns and specialised programmes?
If yes, how did we increase awareness?
How many boys did we enrol through this campaign?
